itemDescription: Saurin, Susan [name in religion Scholastica] (1829–1915), Roman Catholic nun

wikipedia_page.main: Susan Saurin alias Mary Brown religious name Mary Scholastica (21 September 1829 – 10 February 1915) was a British Roman Catholic nun. She was the subject of the "Great Convent Case" which found that she had been mistreated by her convent and that the church had failed to give her justice.
